ifTrueActivities.name: Debug Copy From SqlServer to ADLS2
Debug Set Latest High Water Mark_copy

dependsOn.activity: Debug Copy From SqlServer to ADLS2
Debug Set Latest High Water Mark_copy

source.sqlReaderQuery:
insert into debug_controller.delta_control
SELECT
    '1234' as pipeline_id
    , 'bronze' as delta_schema
    , 'fact_order' as table_name
    , '2022-01-01 00:01:00' as hwm
    , 1000 as adjustment_seconds
    , '2022-01-01 00:01:00' as insert_ts
    ,'2022-01-01 00:01:00' as insert_date
;
select 'x'

value.value: @if(or(equals(pipeline().parameters.p_override_high_watermark, ''), equals(pipeline().parameters.p_override_high_watermark, null)),if(or(equals(activity('Get High Watermark').output.firstRow.hwm, ''), equals(activity('Get High Watermark').output.firstRow.hwm, null)), pipeline().globalParameters.gp_low_datetime,activity('Get High Watermark').output.firstRow.hwm),pipeline().parameters.p_override_high_watermark)
